# NoneBot: Build Powerful, Cross-Platform Python Chatbots with Ease

**Supercharge your chatbot development with NoneBot, a modern, asynchronous, and extensible Python framework.** ([See the original repo](https://github.com/nonebot/nonebot2))

## Key Features

*   **Asynchronous Architecture:** Built on Python's async features for high performance and scalability.
*   **Easy Development:**  Streamlined development with NB-CLI, allowing you to focus on your bot's logic.
*   **Type-Safe:**  100% type-annotated for reliable code and early bug detection.
*   **Extensive Community & Resources:**  Benefit from a large and active community with vast resources.
*   **Cross-Platform Support:**  Adaptable to multiple chat platforms with customizable protocol adapters.

## What is NoneBot?

NoneBot2 is a cutting-edge Python framework designed to build versatile and powerful chatbots. Its modular design and asynchronous nature make it ideal for handling high volumes of messages and integrating with various platforms. It's built with Python's type hints for a more stable and maintainable codebase.

### Supported Platforms

NoneBot2 supports a wide range of chat platforms through adapter plugins:

| Platform           | Status |  Description                                                 |
|--------------------|:------:|-------------------------------------------------------------|
| OneBot             |   ✅   | Supports QQ, TG, WeChat, KOOK, etc.                       |
| Telegram           |   ✅   |                                                             |
| Feishu             |   ✅   |                                                             |
| GitHub             |   ✅   | GitHub APP & OAuth APP                                      |
| QQ                 |   ✅   | QQ official interface adjustments                         |
| Console            |   ✅   | Console interaction                                         |
| Red                |   ✅   | QQNT protocol                                               |
| Satori             |   ✅   | Supports Onebot, TG, Feishu, WeChat, Koishi, etc.         |
| Discord            |   ✅   | Discord Bot protocol                                        |
| DoDo               |   ✅   | DoDo Bot protocol                                           |
| Kritor             |   ✅   | Kritor (OnebotX) protocol, QQNT robot interface standard   |
| Mirai              |   ✅   | QQ protocol                                                 |
| Milky              |   ✅   | QQNT robot application interface standard                  |
| ... and many more! (See full list below) |

### Web Frameworks

Choose your preferred web framework:

*   FastAPI
*   Quart (async Flask)
*   aiohttp (client)
*   httpx (client)
*   websockets (client)

## Get Started

1.  **Install pipx:**
    ```bash
    python -m pip install --user pipx
    python -m pipx ensurepath
    ```
2.  **Install the CLI tool:**
    ```bash
    pipx install nb-cli
    ```
3.  **Create a new project:**
    ```bash
    nb create
    ```
4.  **Run your bot:**
    ```bash
    nb run
    ```

## Additional Platform Support:

**Note:**  The status indicates whether the adapter is actively maintained and available. ↗️ indicates community contributions. ❌ indicates deprecated or no longer available.

*   [DingTalk](https://github.com/nonebot/adapter-ding) (🤗 - Seeking maintainers)
*   [Kaiheila](https://github.com/Tian-que/nonebot-adapter-kaiheila) (↗️)
*   [Ntchat](https://github.com/JustUndertaker/adapter-ntchat) (↗️)
*   [MineCraft](https://github.com/17TheWord/nonebot-adapter-minecraft) (↗️)
*   [BiliBili Live](https://github.com/wwweww/adapter-bilibili) (↗️)
*   [Walle-Q](https://github.com/onebot-walle/nonebot_adapter_walleq) (↗️)
*   [Villa (deprecated)](https://github.com/CMHopeSunshine/nonebot-adapter-villa) (❌)
*   [Rocket.Chat](https://github.com/IUnlimit/nonebot-adapter-rocketchat) (↗️)
*   [Tailchat](https://github.com/eya46/nonebot-adapter-tailchat) (↗️)
*   [Mail](https://github.com/mobyw/nonebot-adapter-mail) (↗️)
*   [Heybox](https://github.com/lclbm/adapter-heybox) (↗️)
*   [Wxmp](https://github.com/YangRucheng/nonebot-adapter-wxmp) (↗️)
*   [Gewechat (Deprecated)](https://github.com/Shine-Light/nonebot-adapter-gewechat) (❌)
*   [EFChat](https://github.com/molanp/nonebot_adapter_efchat) (↗️)
